name: Untold Legends: Brotherhood of the Blade
summary: Get ready for the first multiplayer role-playing game on the PSP. In Untold Legends: Brotherhood of the Blade, you'll enter a world rife with action and randomly generated environments, monsters, and items. First, you must select from four unique character classes, including the knight, alchemist, druid, and hunter. Then it's up to you and your chosen brothers to unravel the mysteries of an evil force that looms over your world. You can play the game solo or team up with a friend through a wireless connection.
info:
• 中文名: 无尽的传说：刀锋兄弟会
